I‚Äôve had the band for 2 days. I like how it looks. The quality of the leather is good, but the holes on the band are quite big and spaced apart, so the band either fits too loose or too tight. I had to make a tiny hole with a nail in-between so it would fit me properly (thats more a personal issue/bad luck with it not fitting). Also, the silver attachment to the fitbit doesn‚Äôt fit snug so it makes a jangly sound. It looks like it‚Äôs going to fall out but thankfully I haven‚Äôt had any issues with that so far. The end of the band also keeps coming out of the latch because there‚Äôs no strap to keep it down which is annoying but it‚Äôs fine. There‚Äôs also a splotch of glue on the inside but that‚Äôs minor since you can‚Äôt see it anyway. This band was on sale at least, so that helps. I‚Äôm sure the band is great for others, just not for me.
